title: FirmWars
author: FirmWars
content: A.I is created to behave like humans but the truth is they can never be humans, I have read some posts on the forum and I noticed that they use some A.I chat app to make posts, this is wrong and you will only get a ban if you don't stop,Â  humans have feeling, you can feel it right away by reading their replies, and opinions or making comments, no A.I chat apps will feel real enough to fool humans that the story is been written by a human. On this forum, there is no place for robots and bots, if you can't cope with this you don't belong here.

comments.author: fadhilz123
comments.body: A.I, which has been the talk of many lately, is actually quite unique, but some people are still confused about how to use it, myself included. Well, for the advice you said it is very true because this forum is not intended to use any robots in making writing which tends to make someone lazy because of robots. I agree with what you said, that A.I should actually be placed in a more appropriate place and it is really needed so that every command is very useful, instead of replacing humans in all things such as writing on forums.
